name: GLOW (itch) (Kaj9296)
description:
GLOW is a simple fast paced top down shooter, and its also my first attempt at a shooter style game, i hope its enough to entertain someone for a few minutes.

The Game consists of red cubes attacking the player, with the player having to avoid their incoming bullets. However the player is limited in shooting in four directions (up,down ,left and right). This forces the player to position themselves in a way where they wont be hit but where they can also shoot the enemy, and potentially shoot multiple enemies at once. The player also has  an ability which reinforces the theme of positioning.

Feel free to report any bugs you may find and any advice is appreciated.
